puththalamin hamuwu apuru ambaa wargaya puththalama thabbowa gowi jana padayata ayath thewanuwara gowi gammanaye itha durlabha ganaye ambaa wargayak pala dara athi athara mema kuda ambaa pokuru washayen pala dara thibima ehi wisheshathwayaki.yodhayan bihikala hela sahale guna waruna poshana gunayen itha ihala paramparika deshiya wi warga warthamanaye pawathina diyawadiyawa, pilika roga aadi noyekuth roga samanaya kirime hakiyawak sahithaya.the wenuwata walla patta wawamudawalla patta samanga miniseku asu uwahoth maha aparadhakaruweku lesa allaganna yugayaka ape ratata wishala widesha winimayak labagatha haki walla patta wagawa rasayanika drawyaya bhawithayen thorawa wagakara the wagawen labanawatath wada wadi aadayamak labagatha hakibawa parisarawedinge mathaya wi thibe.ruwa wadana wisha nasana kaha wagawakin obe athamita saru karagannapilika nashaka gunathi kaha aarthika watinamak athi bhogayaki.gowiyage athamita sarukarana bulath wagawak obath arambaannapiliganwana wita bulath atha, katedi bulath wita, inedi bulath payiya, gedaradi bulath heppuwa, mangulakadi bulath thattuwa, awamangulakadi ilaththattuwa, gamanak yana wita bulath madissalaya, aagamika katayuthu waladi dahath wattiya, dewalayedi dalu mura, kumbauredi bulath pettiya, kanthawan langadi bulath hambailiya aadi washayen bulatha wiwidhakarayen jana jiwithaya ha bandi pawathi.yali hadariya yuthu hela geawithana pulasthi rawana yugathek wihidi athi hela gowithana maha widyathmaka danum sambarayakin yuktha parisarika sanwedi gowithanaki.
